intro: Tournefortia obscura, commonly known as the dark tournefortia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of the Americas, particularly found in countries like Mexico and parts of Central America. The plant is characterized by its small, pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters, often appearing in the axils of the leaves. Its leaves are typically elliptical or ovate, with a rough texture and a dark green color. Tournefortia obscura is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its compact size and attractive foliage.
